title: This is Anime Sound Effects Pack
description: Unleash the energy of your favorite anime worlds with the “This is Anime” sound effects pack! This extensive library is packed with over 500 royalty-free SFX, crafted to bring the vibrant and dynamic world of anime to your projects.
longDescription:
Unleash the energy of your favorite anime worlds with the “This is Anime” sound effects pack! This extensive library is packed with over 500 royalty-free SFX, crafted to bring the vibrant and dynamic world of anime to your projects. Whether you’re working on an action-packed battle scene, a magical fantasy adventure, or a light-hearted comedy, this pack has the perfect sounds to elevate your work.


Dive into a vast collection of sound categories, including dramatic impacts, swift whooshes, explosive blasts, intense fight sequences, hilarious comedic effects, futuristic lasers, epic sword clashes, and quirky wobbling sounds. And remember, if you accidentally summon a giant robot or open a portal to another dimension, don’t blame us—blame the sound effects!


This pack of royalty-free content includes; 

⦿ 520+ x sound effects


“This is Anime” Sound Effects PRO Pack is suitable for any game genre that features anime elements.


This sound pack includes; 


⦿ Magical Shimmers

⦿ Energy Blasts

⦿ Swooshes

⦿ Whooshes

⦿ Synth Drones

⦿ Wobbles

⦿ Elemental Attacks

⦿ Fight Impacts

⦿ Rumbling Sounds

⦿ Sci-Fi Weapons

⦿ Explosions

⦿ Sword Shings

⦿ Metal Resonances

⦿ Power Ups

⦿ Charge and Discharges

⦿ Risers
